title: Implement End-to-End Encryption for User Files
summary: Introduces end-to-end encryption for user files to enhance data security and privacy compliance.

title: User Data Consent Management
summary: Introduces a consent management module to ensure user data is handled in compliance with privacy regulations.

title: Advanced File Sharing Permissions
summary: Introduces granular sharing permissions to enhance data privacy and comply with GDPR by allowing users to set specific access levels for shared files.
